page.title: 14Tourism in Marsworth
page.content: At Startop End there are Two public houses.{The White Lion} welcomes summer tourist trade.It employs 12_15 part time workers _6 in the Winter. Many visitors from America and the Orient.Main attraction_ Reservoirs and the canal.{The Anglers Retreat { Recently changed name}from The Queen's Head.Walls adorned with record sized fish caught in the reservoir. The Red{Lion}Tends to be the Village Pub.Near Church. Football and Darts team compete in local leagues. Part of Aylesbury Brewery Co.Towersey Morris Dancers visit Bank Holidays.Tourists come for Pretty walks,Tring Natural History Museum,Ashridge,Pitstone Windmill,Church Festivals and fetes. Bird watching,Angling,Canal life Disadvantages:Litter,Car parking,Canal path crowded by anglers,No toilets,noise,Traffic.
